Posts.EditableText:
Hi, Please some help and tell me how to edit the command bar / input bar.
I want to make it look old school. e.g

You are a small room.
you can go north.

What now ?

If you can not edit the command bar, maybe change the "type here" to "what now ?"
Posts.HTML:
Hi, Please some help and tell me how to edit the command bar / input bar.

you can go north.
